thread.title: No viral testing of sewage-filled Olympic waters in Rio PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: No viral testing of sewage-filled Olympic waters in Rio | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: No viral testing of sewage-filled Olympic waters in Rio PBS NewsHour
text: The organizers of the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, said this week they do not plan to test the human sewage-laden waterways that will be home to aquatic events for viruses that athletes fear could make them sick. NewsHour's Megan Thompson reports.
